languages.text: "Никак не уймешься, {name}? Ладно, я отвечу. Мы были близки к цели — еще несколько лет, еще больше чистых, обращенных в истинную веру... Но ткачи устроили эту выходку с купальней, а ты вцепил{mf|ся|ась} в их наводку мертвой хваткой. Когда дошло до телепатического ритуала, стало ясно — ты не оставишь нас в покое, и придется начать сезон жатвы раньше".

traits.locale_text: "Никак не уймешься, {name}? Ладно, я отвечу. Мы были близки к цели — еще несколько лет, еще больше чистых, обращенных в истинную веру... Но ткачи устроили эту выходку с купальней, а ты вцепил{mf|ся|ась} в их наводку мертвой хваткой. Когда дошло до телепатического ритуала, стало ясно — ты не оставишь нас в покое, и придется начать сезон жатвы раньше".

languages.text: "You don't know when to stop, do you, {name}? Fine, I'll tell you. We were close to our goal — a few more years, a few more pure converts to the true faith... But the spinners pulled that stunt with the bath and you seized on their tip-off right away. When it came to the telepathic ritual, it became clear that you weren't going to leave us alone and that we'd have to start the harvest season early."
languages.original_text: "Никак не уймешься, {name}? Ладно, я отвечу. Мы были близки к цели — еще несколько лет, еще больше чистых, обращенных в истинную веру... Но ткачи устроили эту выходку с купальней, а ты вцепил{mf|ся|ась} в их наводку мертвой хваткой. Когда дошло до телепатического ритуала, стало ясно — ты не оставишь нас в покое, и придется начать сезон жатвы раньше".

languages.text: «No sabes cuándo parar, ¿no, {name}? De acuerdo, hablaré. Estábamos muy cerca de lograr nuestro objetivo: unos años más, otros pocos conversos puros a la fe verdadera... Pero los tejedores montaron el numerito del baño y te lanzaste a seguir su consejo. Cuando aquello llevó al ritual telepático, fue evidente que no ibas a dejarnos en paz y que tendríamos que empezar la cosecha antes de tiempo».
languages.original_text: "You don't know when to stop, do you, {name}? Fine, I'll tell you. We were close to our goal — a few more years, a few more pure converts to the true faith... But the spinners pulled that stunt with the bath and you seized on their tip-off right away. When it came to the telepathic ritual, it became clear that you weren't going to leave us alone and that we'd have to start the harvest season early."

languages.text: 「いつ止めればいいのか、わからないのですね、{name}？いいでしょう、お教えします。我々は目標に近づいていました。あと数年あれば、真の信仰への純粋な改宗者があと数人いれば…ですが、織り手が浴槽であのような芸当をし、陛下はその情報を即座に把握なされた。テレパシー儀式に関しては、陛下が我々を放置しないことは明らかでしたから、収穫期を早めざるを得なくなったのです」
languages.original_text: "You don't know when to stop, do you, {name}? Fine, I'll tell you. We were close to our goal — a few more years, a few more pure converts to the true faith... But the spinners pulled that stunt with the bath and you seized on their tip-off right away. When it came to the telepathic ritual, it became clear that you weren't going to leave us alone and that we'd have to start the harvest season early."

languages.text: “你真是从来不懂得见好就收啊，是吧，{name}？好吧，实话告诉你，我们本来已经非常接近目标了。只要再过几年，再让更多的人皈依真正的信仰就够了……可那些织网者在你的浴缸里耍了个花招，而你立刻抓住了他们的线索，之后还举行了那场灵能仪式。当时的情况很明显，你绝对不会对我们置之不理，因此我们不得不提前开始收获。”
languages.original_text: "You don't know when to stop, do you, {name}? Fine, I'll tell you. We were close to our goal — a few more years, a few more pure converts to the true faith... But the spinners pulled that stunt with the bath and you seized on their tip-off right away. When it came to the telepathic ritual, it became clear that you weren't going to leave us alone and that we'd have to start the harvest season early."

languages.text: "Ihr wisst nicht, wann es genug ist, oder, {name}? Aber gut. Ich sage es Euch. Wir standen kurz vor unserem Ziel ... noch ein paar Jahre, einige reine Konvertiten des wahren Glaubens ... Aber dann haben die Spinner die Nummer mit dem Bad abgezogen und Ihr habt ihren Tipp sofort aufgegriffen. Spätestens nach dem telepathischen Ritual war klar, dass Ihr uns nicht in Ruhe lassen würdet und wir früher mit der Ernte beginnen mussten."
languages.original_text: "You don't know when to stop, do you, {name}? Fine, I'll tell you. We were close to our goal — a few more years, a few more pure converts to the true faith... But the spinners pulled that stunt with the bath and you seized on their tip-off right away. When it came to the telepathic ritual, it became clear that you weren't going to leave us alone and that we'd have to start the harvest season early."

languages.text: « Vous ne savez pas quand vous arrêter, hmm, {name} ? Très bien, je vais vous le dire. Nous avions presque atteint notre but. Si nous avions eu quelques années de plus pour en convertir davantage à la foi véritable… Mais après leur petit tour de force avec le bain, les tisseurs ont réussi à attirer votre attention, et vous avez tout de suite compris ce qu'ils cherchaient à vous dire. Quant au rituel télépathique, il était devenu évident que vous n'alliez pas nous laisser en paix et que nous allions devoir lancer la saison des récoltes plus tôt que prévu. »
languages.original_text: "You don't know when to stop, do you, {name}? Fine, I'll tell you. We were close to our goal — a few more years, a few more pure converts to the true faith... But the spinners pulled that stunt with the bath and you seized on their tip-off right away. When it came to the telepathic ritual, it became clear that you weren't going to leave us alone and that we'd have to start the harvest season early."

languages.text: "Ne zaman susacağını bilmiyorsun, değil mi {name}? Pekâlâ, söyleyeceğim. Gayemize yaklaşmıştık. Birkaç yılımız daha, hakiki inancın tertemiz yolunu gösterdiğimiz birkaç kişi daha olsaydı... Ancak dokurlar o hamam numarasını oynadılar. Sen de ipuçlarını hemen değerlendirdin. Telepatik ayin gündeme geldiğinde bizi rahat bırakmayacağını ve hasat mevsimine erken başlamamız gerektiğini anladık."
languages.original_text: "You don't know when to stop, do you, {name}? Fine, I'll tell you. We were close to our goal — a few more years, a few more pure converts to the true faith... But the spinners pulled that stunt with the bath and you seized on their tip-off right away. When it came to the telepathic ritual, it became clear that you weren't going to leave us alone and that we'd have to start the harvest season early."
